title: Random Meme Generator
description: Crafted a React.js app enabling spontaneous meme creation by integrating an API for random image retrieval.

title: AirBnB Clone
description: Developed a responsive Airbnb clone using React, HTML, and CSS. This project showcases my skills in front-end development

title: Whac A Mole
description: Developed an interactive Whac-A-Mole, Demonstrated front-end design and interactivity skills in web-based gaming.

title: Chrome Extension
description: Created a custom Chrome extension that enhances browsing by saving copied URLs to local storage.

title: BlackJack Game
description: I designed and developed a fully functional Blackjack game,This project demonstrates my passion for web development and my ability to create engaging user interfaces and dynamic experiences.

title: YouTube Clone
description: Created a YouTube clone using only HTML and CSS to challenge myself in building interactive websites without JavaScript. Demonstrating creative skills in web development.
